page.title: 15THORNHILL THE BUS SERVICE
page.content: The local bus comes through Thornhill five times a day.It starts from Aberfoyle and the first bus of the day reaches our village at eight o'clock in the morning and it goes to Stirling.The second bus comes into Thornhill at eleven a.m. and that also goes to Stirling.The first bus that comes back from Stirling arrives at Thornhill at six p.m.That is the last bus of the day.There are two buses that come from Dunblane each school day and they take the High School children up to McLaren High School in Callander.There is also a "free bus" that takes people to "Fine Fare",a supermarket in Stirling.The owners of this store pay for this bus to encourage shoppers to use their supermarket.The bus that comes every day is usually late!
